DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot study evaluate feasibility recruit African American prostate cancer survivor 12 week physical activity intervention study three arm ( aerobics , resistance training , usual care ) physician referral community advertisement strategy . In addition , investigator investigate acceptance rate intervention gather preliminary result effect exercise African American men 's urinary sexual function . These data use refine intervention implementation model , inform submission large grant National Institutes Health .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Activity Intervention African American Men After Radical Prostatectomy
DOC.criteria: Speaks English African American Radical prostatectomy treatment prostate cancer within past 12 month Cleared physician safely participate physical exercise program Does speak English NonAfrican American Previously undergone radiation treatment pelvis Previously undergone major pelvic surgery Known urethral stricture , colostomy , inability urinate require chronic urinary catheter
